headline: Is It Time To Reassess Fortinet (FTNT) After Recent Cybersecurity Sector Weakness?
summary: If you are trying to figure out whether Fortinet's current share price offers value or not, you are in the right place for a clear, valuation-focused look at the stock. Fortinet last closed at US$75.60, with returns of an 11.6% decline over 7 days, a 7.4% decline over 30 days, a 2.9% decline year to date, a 30.4% decline over 1 year, 26.8% over 3 years and 118.2% over 5 years, which can change how investors think about both its potential and its risks.
